doctor.name: Dr. Sudip Kumar Karmoker
doctor.workplace: Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery
doctor.info: Dr. Sudip Kumar Karmoker is a Plastic Surgeon in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Plastic Surgery). He is a Consultant, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Sudip Kumar Karmoker at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 2pm to 4pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura
